name: .VITAL
summary: Learn about .VITAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To open a VITAL file in Vital (cross-platform):
Select the sandwich menu located in Vital's center.
From the sandwich menu, select Open External Preset.
Browse to and open your VITAL file.
The settings your VITAL file contains will then be applied in Vital.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .vital file in Vital
images.caption: VITAL file open in Vital
